wikipedia_page.main: Murry Hope (17 September 1929 – 25 October 2012) was an English writer and occultist. Considered a Wiccan priestess and a New Age author, she wrote sundry books on the topics of psychology, human consciousness, the future of planet Earth, witchcraft, the Sirius star system, et al.

response: * Murry Hope (1929–2012), English writer and occultist
* 1996: Murry Hope (book, The Sirius Connection: Unlocking the Secrets of Ancient Egypt)
